title: Ketu Transit in the 11th House for Aries Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting your 11th house brings detachment from large social circles, material gains, and expectation-driven ambitions. This phase reduces interest in networking for profit or validation, making friendships feel selective or distant. Long-term goals may lose urgency unless they align with inner purpose. While gains can still occur, emotional satisfaction from achievements decreases. Ketu filters superficial associations and unrealistic desires, redirecting focus toward meaningful contribution rather than numbers, popularity, or external success metrics.

sections.heading: Gains & Rewards
points: Indifference toward financial or social gains

sections.heading: Friends & Networks
points: Social circle becomes smaller and selective

sections.heading: Inner Fulfillment
points: Shift from external success to inner peace
Reduced need for approval or applause

challenges: Loss of motivation for large goals
closing: Ketu in the 11th house filters desires and networks. Detachment refines ambition into purpose-driven fulfillment.
